channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Storage Protect Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Storage Protect Client

item.title: CVE-2023-40368|2023-09-20T18:43:43.601Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20client
item.description: IBM Storage Protect 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.19.0 could allow a privileged user to obtain sensitive information from the administrative command line client. IBM X-Force ID: 263456.

item.title: CVE-2023-35897|2023-10-06T13:06:34.570Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20client
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Client and IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.19.0 could allow a local user to execute arbitrary code on the system using a specially crafted file, caused by a DLL hijacking flaw. IBM X-Force ID: 259246.
